title: Pixel 3 volume on Airpods 2 is very low
content:
I'm using Airpods 2 with Pixel 3 and experiencing low volume when using any media app (Spotify, any podcast app).
I have tested my Airpods on my MacBook and they work well (the volume can reach extream hights).
I tested the Pixel with the wired earbuds i got when i bought it and volume worked well, so i tested it with another Bluetooth earbud I have (JBL under armor sports) and volume was great

I tried the "absolute volume" suggestion but no effect at all.

no idea what to do )-:

Mor
